name: Online Class on Zoom - Restorative
description: This class will be held online via Zoom.$10 drop in, free for all members with unlimited passes.You'll need a an account with Zoom (free), you might want to download the Zoom App. Register per usual via Mindbody or our free Namastuy App up to 30min before class & you'll get an email with a link and password to join in… 10min before class begin.    Chill out?! Slow down and self care. A practice that utilizes props to create comfort and ease in positions to facilitate relaxation and an opportunity to reset. A practice of intentional stillness that sets the platform for simply BEING, rather than the constant DOING. Poses like gentle twists, supported forward folds, backbends or supported inversions giveaway for expansion of breath. Accessible to any level, great for injuries. Leaves you feeling well balanced and in harmony.

name: Vinyasa | All Levels | Online, live via zoom
description: This is an online class that takes place live via Zoom. Sign up in advance of the class and receive an email invitation before the class begins. You'll need zoom account to join.  Vinyasa | All LevelsVinyasa is a moving meditation where each pose is strung together on the the thread of breath. At the Shala, vinyasa is shaped by the lineage… of Ashtanga Yoga: economic, rigorous, and challenging. All Level classes are a well-rounded blend of alignment and fluid movement. Open to beginning practitioners with some knowledge of foundational postures (Surya Namaskar, standing and seated poses, backbends), as well as intermediate and advanced practitioners interested moving in a gentler and more precise way. Guidance will be provided regarding safe alignment, strength-building, joint stabilization, and proper breathing technique.

name: LIVESTREAM SPARKYIN CLASS
description: Please join us for one of our brand new livestream classes, via Zoom. Yin yoga from the comfort of your home! The details: -Register for this class no later than 30 minutes before class start time-15 minutes prior to class, you will receive a link from one of our managers to a Zoom meeting, which you can access from your… desktop, laptop, iPad or phone. You will likely be prompted to download the Zoom app to whatever device you are using.-You will also receive a link to a Spotify playlist (see below).The class will open up to participants 15 minutes prior to class start time and will begin promptly at class start time. --We will sign you in to the class as you join the Zoom meeting.-You will have the option to be seen or not seen by your instructor. Should you choose to be seen, that will help them give you verbal adjustments and shout outs as well as create more of a class vibe, but it is entirely up to you! You will be muted once class starts but will be able to chat with the instructor if you have any questions.-Class will be an open level, challenging, fun power flow in the classic YogaSpark style, with plenty of modifications and options.-There will be no music during class, but your instructor will tell you when to press play on the Spotify playlist so that the class can move with the music in sync. You will likely need a second device to play the music from.  Thank you for bearing with us during these technically challenging times, as we attempt to recreate the YogaSpark experience as best we can on various platforms!

name: Flexibility for Ground 360 Wellness Program
address: 43 Schermerhorn Street 117 14th Street, Brooklyn, NY 11201Brooklyn Heights
description: Flexibility

name: Flexibility for Pole 360 Wellness Program
address: 43 Schermerhorn Street 117 14th Street, Brooklyn, NY 11201Brooklyn Heights
description: This class will increase your full range of mobility. We start with a warm up to increase the heart rate. Class moves at a moderate pace of holding postures for 2-5 minutes. Students learn to give and receive partner stretches which educate how their bodies work. Highly recommended for students who want to increase their flexibility.

name: HH Restorative Yoga-Zoom
description: Think adult nap time ! In truth, restorative yoga is simply that  restorative & It is well known for its calming and healing effect! This modality is a practice focused on breath control, meditation during long holds of postures (5-15 minutes) which are supported by props in order for the body to relax deeply. The mindfulness that… is found in all disciplines of yoga is taken to the next level. Prepare yourself to venture into the depths of the mind, loosen tension and enjoy long, meditative stretches while resting the body over pillows, blocks & blankets.This practice is helpful for those working with injuries sensitivities as well as for anyone feeling stressed out or anxious.

name: Yang Yin Yoga
address: 190 Christopher Columbus Drive 5C, Jersey City, NJ 07302Downtown Jersey City
description: This Yin/Yang class is a 1 hour practice where you will be guided in to long hold postures. The first half of the class will be dynamic long holds and the second half of the class will be passive long holds. Doing this allows you to stretch fascia and connective tissue to release yourself from tension held deep within the body; very… similarly to when you go and enjoy a massage from your favorite Knead massage expert! ten The connective tissue release allows you to learn how to soften and surrender in to your body; letting go of unnecessary tension from both your body and mind. You will increase your flexibility and regulate your vagus nerve. As your body learns to reconstruct itself, you will heal from past injuries that you may never even known you had. You will leave class feeling relaxed, energized, and ready to focus on your day. Hands on adjustments will be made throughout class to enhance your movement and yoga practice.

name: Virtual Candlelit Vinyasa + Yoga Nidra
description: Light some candles, some incense, and dim the lights. Set the mood for a very special wind down to your week. Expect lots of twists, hip openers, and slightly longer holds of postures. Well close with a 10-15 min yoga nidra guided relaxation to prepare you for a deep sleep. All levels welcome.  This class will be held on… Zoom. You must sign up on MindBodyn at least 30 minutes before the start of class to reserve your space. You will be emailed a link 10 minutes before the start of class to join.  If you cannot attend live, but would like to receive the video recording of the class to download, stay signed in and you will receive a link to download when the class is finished. Downloads must be completed within 24 hours of receiving the emailed link.  Cancellations 1 hour prior to the start of class will be charged $11.

name: Yoga & Sound Healing (Livestream via Zoom only)
address: 360 Jefferson Street 360 Jefferson Street, Brooklyn, NY 11237Bushwick
description: Full body flow combining movement and breath followed by a long restorative meditation guided by healing vibration of sound led by Andrea Baquero.  Andrea Baquero is a Sound Energy Healer, musician, teacher, journalist, and founder of AB Music LLC.Andrea is based in New York City and often works in Detroit and… Barcelona. Andrea Baquero has taught music for over 20 years, is a Steinway & Sons Educational Partner, and has performed as a pianist and singer around the world.In 1996, while still a teenager, Andrea began her career as a music teacher in Bogota, Colombia. Since then, she has continued her formal training as well as her work promoting, teaching and exploring sound and music.In 2005 she received her undergraduate degree in Classical Piano and Music Education in Colombia, followed by an MA in Journalism in 2007. Andrea has received national and international awards for her piano performances of the works of Johan Sebastian Bach. She also received four silver diplomas in the 2006 World Choir Games in Xiamen, China, and received the 2007 Best Music Writing award in Bogota, Colombia.After arriving in New York City in 2008, Andrea developed the initiation to music and Spanish Mishake program as well as her private music and piano lessons. She also studied Inclusive Education, Public Relations, and Digital Journalism.In 2018 and after a two year personal transformation, Andrea studied Sound Healing in London with Lola Lhamo, founder of the Vibroacoustic Therapy Association, where she is a certified member. When shes not working on her music, sound therapy or teaching, Andrea likes to spend time collaborating with various animal non-profits and traveling.

name: Group Training
description: Ours are different from regular boxing classes you might find elsewhere in that you work with a group of trainers each time that you come in. All of our trainers are active or former professional athletes who are well-versed in what it takes to get you to achieve your goals in a challenging, exciting, yet safe way. They all… came from slightly different backgrounds and therefor you receive an excellent workout every time and there's always a little variety.  If you can make it in to the gym two or more times per week, choose the unlimited group training option. If you can't make it to the gym more than once a week, then the package of ten group lessons is the most cost effective option for you. You will join in the group lessons when you choose and you have three months in which to use them up.

name: MEN’S WELLNESS DEVELOPMENT
description: MENS WELLNESS DEVELOPMENT // MON + FRI 7am with AndrGyrotonic trainer and dancer Andr M. Zachery will lead a class designed for men to retain strength, gain flexibility, improve posture and increase stamina. Men will be encouraged to increase range of motion through breath-work and postures to open joints for… greater flow of oxygen through the body. This is designed as a safe-space for men to recover and work on a range of health issues in collective support.

name: Ashtanga | Mysore, for students with Mysore Ashtanga experience
description: This class takes place live via Zoom. Sign up for this class online via MindBody app or website, and a link to the zoom session will be emailed to you in a registration confirmation email. Let us know atinfo@theshala.comif you don't see this email!  This class is for students with mysore experience students only. Students who… are new to the mysore method should take led ashtanga classes or wait to start until it can be taught in a studio.  Ashtanga | Mysore All LevelsSuitable for all levels, Mysore Ashtanga format is a one-room schoolhouse, with practitioners just starting out on the set sequence studying alongside practitioners well into Third and Fourth Series under the guidance and support of a skilled teacher. Mysore ashtanga is a moving meditation where each pose is strung together on the the thread of breath. Students will learn the traditional sequence of Ashtanga slowly and methodically. All students are welcome; come as you are.Please note that Mysore Ashtanga is not a drop-in class. Mysore practice is unique in that its potency lies in making a consistent commitment of 3-6 days a week. This is a requirement. We ask that you allow at least one month of dedicated practice to see if the method is right for you. You are welcome to come observe to see if you would like to try it.

name: Livestream: Bar Method Express
description: Low impact. High reward. Our classic interval-training workout is designed to help you lose inches by burning fat and sculpting lean muscles. A well-designed sequence of specific movements will target and reshape your muscles. And stretches incorporated throughout the class will tone and elongate your body. The best method to… transform and renew you.45 minutes  Who it's for:Everyone  especially those seeking optimal fat-burning workouts and full-body transformation.  What you can gain:Stronger, leaner musclesIncreased flexibilityImproved posture, core strength and balance

name: LiveStream Online Virtual Barre Class
description: Barre without the barre! Intense, powerful, total body workout. Yet accessible to all levels! Elements of strengthening, toning, lengthening, and cardio. Fun and challenging!

name: VIRTUAL: Fierce & Fit Pilates
description: Fierce & Fit Pilates  Planks anyone? Oh yes, please! Katie teaches this class only once a week, so be sure not to miss it! Katie makes sure your core is fired up and energized while she helps you tone every inch of your body! Well-cued and packed with body-sculpting exercises, this class delivers a great Pilates workout with… core-challenging planks and heart pumping moves. No equipment necessary as your own body weight is your strength training equipment.

name: Align Define - LIVE
description: >> Download ZOOM on your mobile device or computer. You will be emailed and texted registration instructions before class. You must register prior to 10 minutes before class to receive the link. <<  Align Define is a full body barre workout that fuses the best elements of ballet, conditioning, and stretching for a unique and… fun experience. Classes begin with a warm up focusing on postural alignment, followed by a combination of upper and lower body exercises using light weights, resistance bands, as well as weighted and unweighted balls. Afterward, we head to the mat for core work and close with an invigorating final stretch. In this intelligent barre class you will move from larger movements that get your heart pumping to "feel-the-burn" pulses and isometric holds, efficiently conditioning your body.

name: OtrainWellnessPods
description: Small Group Personal Training Virtual Sessions 4 people per Pod Attend once a week for the month any of the small group sessions on the schedule with a monthly subscription. Or stick to one Pod and drop in whenever you feel like it. Get individual attention from the coach, accountability and a quality workout… specifically for your goals.

name: Virtual Mat Pilates
description: Come work out with Elevate from the comfort of your own home! This signature class will incorporate some of the same moves you love to do on the reformer (but on the mat) and more! Work your body in different ways strengthening and lengthening every inch! Abs, butt,arms and more finishing with a calming stretch!

name: Classic Mat Pilates - ONLINE
description: For all levels, this 60 minute class will flow through a diverse menu of Classic Pilates exercises, and challenge your core, hips, and coordination.

name: Hour L2 LIVESTREAM
address: 135 West 20th Street 6th Floor b/w 6th & 7th Ave, New York, NY 10011Midtown
description: This is a one hour version of our Level 2 class  a well-rounded practice in a shorter amount of time. You have an understanding of the basic poses and transitional movements of a Vinyasa class (down dog, plank, chaturanga, cobra/upward dog). Youll get more dynamic sequences with challenging poses, subtle… alignment of basic poses, and an introduction to other yoga practices.  THIS IS AN ONLINE CLASS! Sign up here, and you'll receive an email to the address associated with your Yogamaya account with a link to take your class from afar.  First time joining us online?  If you are using a computer/laptop, please visit www.zoom.us to sign up. If you are joining us on your mobile device (phone, iPad, tablet, etc.), please download the Zoom app.  Please take a few moments to get to know the Zoom software, as it may be difficult for us to troubleshoot once you are in the class. If you have questions, please e-mail info@yogamayanewyork.com.

name: ZOOM - Bar Express
address: 678 Broadway Second Floor, New York, NY 10012
description: Join us on ZOOM! Link will be emailed to the address you have on file 15 minutes before class is set to begin.Efficient yet effective. This class offers fat-burning, muscle-building benefits in a slightly shorter class format. If 45 minutes is all you have to give, well make the most of it. Because busy is no excuse to your body.Low… impact. High reward. Our classic interval-training workout is designed to help you lose inches by burning fat and sculpting lean muscles. A well-designed sequence of specific movements will target and reshape your muscles. And stretches incorporated throughout the class will tone and elongate your body. The best method to transform and renew you.  Who it's for:  Everyone  especially those seeking optimal fat-burning workouts and full-body transformation.  What you can gain:  Stronger, leaner musclesIncreased flexibilityImproved posture, core strength and balance

name: Intermediate Level Reformer
description: Intermediate Level Reformer classes are ideal for clients who have consistently practiced and have a good understanding of the principles of Pilates as well as how to navigate the equipment. 55 minutes

name: HH Rise and Flow-Zoom
description: This morning flow is the perfect early practice to awaken the body and prepare the mind for the day. Moving through dynamic Asana, building heat, strength & flexibility creates a balanced relationship between all senses. This class is appropriate for all levels of yoga students who have some or no experience with… yoga. The instructor will offer modifications for level 1 students as well as more challenging poses for advanced students. Above all else, this class wants you to move like you. To intuitively listen to what your body needs in the present moment.

name: VIRTUAL:  Total Body Pilates
description: Total Body Pilates  a good old fashioned Pilates Mat class with Kelly! Joseph Pilates started his entire system with his mat exercises so what better time to get back to the basics! Join Kelly as she teaches the Pilates mat repertoire to strengthen your abs, tone and stretch your legs and mobilize your spine in all planes of… motion. Shell get you moving and breathing and feeling GREAT! Modifications are taught with Kellys well-known clarity and attention to detail, so Kellys class is appropriate for all levels.

name: Virtual Level 1 Reformer Class
description: This Level 1 Reformer Class includes a well rounded selection of exercises that are safe for most clients.Level 1 is the Reformer class level following our New Client Orientation Class. In this class the focus is on strengthening the abdominals and learning to stabilize your pelvis and spine while mastering the… repertoire of Level 1 exercises. We recommend 15 - 20 sessions in Level 1 before asking your teacher if you are ready to be tagged for the Mid Level Class.The Mid Level requires spinal flexibility, good abdominal control as well as wrist and shoulder stability and strength to be able to handle the more advanced Pilates Reformer exercises. Keep this thought in mind...the more advanced you become and the more correct your technique and alignment becomes the more you realize that Level 1 is challenging when performed correctly!

name: H.E.A.T
description: High-Energy Activation Training: These challenging total-body circuits take you from warm-up, to strength training, to a cardio finisher in 30 minutes.

name: Virtual Mat Pilates
description: Come work out with Elevate from the comfort of your own home! This signature class will incorporate some of the same moves you love to do on the reformer (but on the mat) and more! Work your body in different ways strengthening and lengthening every inch! Abs, butt,arms and more finishing with a calming stretch!

name: Small Group Pilates Reformer
description: A 50 minute elevated, total body workout focused on dynamic movements stemming from your core. Our classes take a contemporary approach to challenging your whole body, strengthening, lengthening and toning!All levels welcome

name: Online Core & Restore Yoga
description: Core and Restore is an open-level class that utilizes core-targeted poses and exercises for the wellness of abs, internal organs, and the back. Long held poses and breath work for deep relaxation. Great for postnatal students and those with low back pain.

name: Online HIIT
description: This High Intensity Interval Training (HIIT) Class led by Moving Strength is amazing! It's a total body conditioning workout using the weight of your own body! Our HIIT Classes utilizes Pilates exercises as well as resistence training. Be prepared to get your heart rate up & work out with us! Have weights, water bottle and a… space to MOVE!

name: VIRTUAL Yoga 2RISE
description: Yoga2RISE:70% Vinyasa-hata yoga20% Fitness10% Meditation  What VIBE do want to feel today in your flow?  In this signature ALL LEVEL yoga class, we combine classic vinyasa yoga flow with elements of spiritual fitness and meditation. Vinyasa is a mindful practice linking breath and movement to help you flow through… each posture with intention.The classes are dynamic, offering different variations for all levels.  The sequence is repeated 3 times to give the ability to learn the poses safely and with alignment and by the end to enjoy the freedom of the movement.  CLASS PERKS:  - yoga and mindfulness- vibrate high and feel balanced in your overall energy having a complete 360 wellness experience- improve flexibility and strength in the body- have a mini interval workout, core or plank sequence within the practice- relax with meditation and savasana  This class meets in Lefferts Gardens 208 Midwood st 11225 BK

name: All Levels Online Live Stream
address: 56 East 11th Street, New York, NY 10003Lower Manhattan
description: This is a well-rounded class that welcomes a wide range of students and levels, encouraging students to individualize their practice by establishing their own degree of intensity. Sequences are kept simple enough so that beginners can learn the basics while instruction is detailed and subtle enough to lead… experienced practitioners to explore deeper levels of their practice through asana, pranayama, and meditation. This class is perfect for the adventurous beginner as well as the experienced practitioner.

name: Original Hot Yoga 60 Live Stream
description: Original Hot Yoga is a series of twenty-six Hatha Yoga postures and two Pranayama breathing techniques designed to provide a challenging, invigorating, rejuvenating and effective yoga experience, typically done in the heat. During this 60 minute class, you will work every muscle, tendon, ligament, joint and… internal organ in the entire body, giving you an incredible sense of well being.  This class is delivered by Zoom in partnership with FitGrid LIVE. You can enroll for this class up until two minutes before the scheduled start. You will receive an email from FitGrid LIVE starting an hour before the class with instructions.

name: Jam Sessions Music - Zoom Interactive Class
address: 123 W20th Street 2E Second floor, New York, NY 10011Midtown
description: IF THERE IS NO SIGN UP OR BOOK CLASS BUTTON THE CLASS IS FULL.  Jam Sessions via ZOOM are interactive! Unlike livestreaming, in these sessions your child's favorite teacher can see and interact with your child. Register for this class and receive a link and a password via email to log in and join the fun! Jam Sessions via ZOOM… will be limited to 8 participants. Join Kids at Work Teachers for 35 minutes of music from the comfort of your own home. Further instructions will be sent for participants that register at least 15 minutes before class! These sessions are $15 per class.  Before Class: Download zoom (https://zoom.us/download) well before class time. Please be aware that when joining this class there is the potential for participants to see one another. All audio will be muted except for teacher for MOST of the class. If you do not want to be seen simply disable your video.  Do I need anything for this class?Please gather any instruments you might have for our "Jam Session". Other objects such as pots and pans, wooden spoons, or Tupperware filled with beans or rice (reinforce with some tape) will work too! If you have bubbles or scarves/pieces of fabric please make them available as we may use those as well!  Didn't get the email with all the info to join the meeting? Check your spam! We'll usually send it about an hour before.

name: LIVESTREAM YOGASPARK CLASS
description: Please join us for one of our brand new livestream classes, via Zoom. The same YogaSpark style in a whole new medium! The details: -Register for this class no later than 30 minutes before class start time-15 minutes prior to class, you will receive a link from one of our managers to a Zoom meeting, which you can access from… your desktop, laptop, iPad or phone. You will likely be prompted to download the Zoom app to whatever device you are using.-You will also receive a link to a Spotify playlist (see below).The class will open up to participants 15 minutes prior to class start time and will begin promptly at class start time. --We will sign you in to the class as you join the Zoom meeting.-You will have the option to be seen or not seen by your instructor. Should you choose to be seen, that will help them give you verbal adjustments and shout outs as well as create more of a class vibe, but it is entirely up to you! You will be muted once class starts but will be able to chat with the instructor if you have any questions.-Class will be an open level, challenging, fun power flow in the classic YogaSpark style, with plenty of modifications and options.-There will be no music during class, but your instructor will tell you when to press play on the Spotify playlist so that the class can move with the music in sync. You will likely need a second device to play the music from. Thank you for bearing with us during these technically challenging times, as we attempt to recreate the YogaSpark experience as best we can on various platforms!

description: Come as You Are. A open-level and well-rounded practice thats appropriate for those with experience in group classes.

description: A well rounded vinyasa yoga class that is appropriate for all levels of students. Vinyasa yoga is a system of yoga that links movement of the body with synchronized breathing.

name: Private Training
address: 226 East 89th Street First Floor, New York, NY 10128UES
description: A 1 on 1 experience here at our facility or in the comfort of your own home or home gym, with one of Mud And Lotus' amazing, informed, fun and challenging Personal Trainers. Mud and Lotus' professionals range from elite gymnasts, to professional dancers, to advanced yogis and Pilates masters. We guarantee a fulfilling experience… and with your consistency & dedication to the programs our trainer's create for you, AMAZING results! Our trainers also create programs for you to do on your own if you are going on vacation as well as your off training days. Accountability and momentum are key! *We always offer the first 30 minute assessment session on the house to make sure we are a good fit!    Pricing  Tier 1 single personal training session at our facility: $125.00,  10 sessions $1150.00 ($115 per - save $150)  20 sessions $2000.00 $100 per - most popular $500 savings)  50 sessions $$4750.00 ($95 per-$1500 savings)  100 sessions $9000.00. ($90 per-$3500 savings- our 2nd most popular package)   Tier 1 Home Visit Private Single: $150  10: $1400.00 ($140 per)  20: $2600.00 ($130 per)  50: $6000.00 ($120 per)  100: $10,000.00 $100 per)   24 hour cancellation policy. No fee but you lose the session. Please contact Jeni Fujita as soon as you know you have to cancel, by texting 917 405 4052.

name: Virtual Stretch Class
description: Virtual Stretch Class

name: ONLINE: Groundcontrol
description: Groundcontrol is a 60 minute class created by Lindsay Ashmun. Scored from a Pilates mat format, we use small props such as ab balls, therabands, gliders and sand bag weights to crank out a breath-based, core-focused workout. This class is extremely relevant for yoga practitioners and movers alike. Exercises have… been specifically designed with yogis and athletes in mind to train the body for deep and balanced strength, optimal range of motion, injury prevention and recovery. Not for prenatal students unless a Pilates or core-strengthening practice is already well established. Interested in purchasing GC props for home? Check out these suggestions from Lindsay:http://a.co/eOxAtbV  Visit our Online Classes FAQ's page for more information regarding registration and viewing classes. www.bendandbloom.com/online-classes-faqs

name: Erika Bloom Method Foundation Series (6 Virtual Sessions)
address: Virtual Sessions Available (NYC), New York, NY 10022
description: Restore radiance, length and beautiful strength to your whole body as wellness expert Erika Bloom guides you through a transformative 3 week (6 session) intensive.In each one hour session, you will learn to forge connections deep within your physiology through challenging movements that are slow, controlled and full of… nourishing breath.This mindful breath and movement practice offers an opportunity for true self care as youll learn to re-pattern your nervous system, enhance your digestion and immunity, and release tension you may be holding in your musculature, fascia and organs.As a result, youll experience greater function and ease through long lasting changes in your bodys biomechanics and posture.A live Q&A will follow every class to ask Erika your questions. All 6 sessions will be recorded and available for 24 hours so that you can access them on your own time, or practice again.6 Session SeriesMondays and Wednesdays at 11:00am (est)  Recordings of live sessions availableStarting Monday, June 29thInstructor: Erika Bloomsign up on MINDBODY

name: Gymnastics Tumbling & Wooden Rings for Aerial Hoop 360 Wellness
address: 43 Schermerhorn Street 117 14th Street, Brooklyn, NY 11201Brooklyn Heights
description: This class happens only in Gownaus, 117 14th Street, suite B, Brooklyn, 11215. Make a note to yourself!  This is our only class which combines ground work (tumbling) and aerial (wooden gymnastics rings) into one class to introduce gymnastics foundations for students. Class begins with movements across the floor to gradually… increase the heart rate and warm-up joints and muscles, and then continues into stretches for the shoulders and hips. Students will learn basic tumbling rolls: forwards, backwards, and variations. Students will learn to execute a short sequence of rolls during each tumbling session. The last half of class will end with wooden gymnastics rings, and focus on the pulling, lifting, and stabilizing muscle groups. Class ends with a cool-down of hip and shoulder stretches. Regular gym attire. Benefits: improved posture, self confidence, strength, and mobility.  This class happens only in Gownaus, 117 14th Street, suite B, Brooklyn, 11215. Make a note to yourself!

The instructor will offer modifications for level 1 students as well as more challenging poses for advanced students. This class links yoga postures with breath and incorporates flowing sequences with an… attention to alignment, as well as opportunities for stillness and reflection. Classes are thoughtful and invite you to explore the deeper aspects of yoga. Above all else, this class wants you to move like you. To intuitively listen to what your body needs in the present moment.

name: Livestream Open Flow - Yoga
address: 100 Hudson Street  4th Fl. (entrance on 1st) , Hoboken, NJ 07030
description: Midday slump happens. Literally. Unplugd is the antidote... Sitting at your desk too long or typing away at the coffee shop? Thats when stress sneaks into the neck, shoulders, and upper back, your posture rounds, and breath becomes shallowoften leaving you exhausted by 3pm. Join US for a rejuvenating sesh that… realigns the spine, opens cramped hips, and mobilizes stiff joints. Carefully chosen poses will nourish your musculoskeletal body (bye bye social media neck) and increase blood flow to restore chilife force energy. And since healthy breathing is key for maintaining balanced energy, well incorporate breathwork to restore concentration and kick stress to the curb. Youll head back to work inspired and in the zone. Employee of the month anyone? OPEN LEVEL.

name: Intermediate Level Reformer
description: Intermediate Level Reformer classes are ideal for clients who have consistently practiced and have a good understanding of the principles of Pilates as well as how to navigate the equipment. 55 minutes

name: All Flow - Live Stream
address: 1087 Flushing Ave Shop #117, Brooklyn, NY 11237East Williamsburg
description: Our classes are currently taught via live stream  This moderately paced vinyasa flow class is suited for most, from those who have only recently hit the mat to the most advanced of practitioners. Teachers will offer modifications that allow students to choose a more beginning or advanced practice according to… their needs as well as mindful suggestions on alignment and technique. All Flow classes allow you the opportunity to move within your own journey while being inspired by students of many different levels.

name: LUNAR RHYTHMS: KUNDALINI YOGA AND MEDITATION
address: 29 Forsyth Street 3rd floor, New York, NY 10002
description: Through the practice of intentional kundalini yoga kriyas and meditations, we will come into an experience of our lunar nature ~ working with the lunar channel & Moon Centers in our bodies, as well as heightening and refining our sensitivity, receptivity, and the feminine principle within. Our Moon asks us to look deeply… inward, to listen to what our body is telling us, and to continue evolving, cycling and flowing with the rhythm of Life.

name: All Flow - Live Stream
description: Our classes are currently taught via live stream  This moderately paced vinyasa flow class is suited for most, from those who have only recently hit the mat to the most advanced of practitioners. Teachers will offer modifications that allow students to choose a more beginning or advanced practice according to… their needs as well as mindful suggestions on alignment and technique. All Flow classes allow you the opportunity to move within your own journey while being inspired by students of many different levels.

name: VIRTUAL: Pilates Mat Fundamentals
description: Mat Fundamentals: Whether youre new to Pilates or have been practicing for years, Emilys well-cued class will visit the fundamentals of mat Pilates with the attention to detail and energy that can benefit all. Emily will help you improve your technique and form in a steady pace that builds strength, flexibility and stability. Emily… will enhance your Pilates practice while you get a great workout!

name: Online Class on Zoom - Vinyasa II
description: This class will be held online via Zoom.$10 drop in, free for all members with unlimited passes.You'll need a an account with zoom (free), you might want to download the Zoom App. Register per usual via Mindbody or our free Namastuy App up to 30min before class & you'll get an email with a link and password to join in… 10min before class begin.    Glow. A fast paced, fluid practice that has a strong focus on breath to build heat from within. Students are guided through a sequence that will increase flexibility, as well as stability. Modifications and props are offered to make the class accessible to any level.

name: Virtual No Props  Mat Class
description: This class requires zero props to experience in the comfort of your own home. Just you, your mat and your screen. You'll be guided through a contemporary mat class that focuses on breath, alignment, stability, mobility, and strength. This class is designed for beginners through advanced levels. Although virtual, instructors… will be making corrections to assure you are getting the most out of your practice and that you are moving well. Get ready for a mindful burn!  Once booked and paid for, you will receive a Zoom invite link 15 minutes before class time.   *Please disclose any injuries so that your instructor can provide proper modifications.

name: Group Training
description: Ours are different from regular boxing classes you might find elsewhere in that you work with a group of trainers each time that you come in. All of our trainers are active or former professional athletes who are well-versed in what it takes to get you to achieve your goals in a challenging, exciting, yet safe way. They all… came from slightly different backgrounds and therefor you receive an excellent workout every time and there's always a little variety.  If you can make it in to the gym two or more times per week, choose the unlimited group training option. If you can't make it to the gym more than once a week, then the package of ten group lessons is the most cost effective option for you. You will join in the group lessons when you choose and you have three months in which to use them up.

name: Private Training
address: 226 East 89th Street First Floor, New York, NY 10128UES
description: A 1 on 1 experience here at our facility or in the comfort of your own home or home gym, with one of Mud And Lotus' amazing, informed, fun and challenging Personal Trainers. Mud and Lotus' professionals range from elite gymnasts, to professional dancers, to advanced yogis and Pilates masters. We guarantee a fulfilling experience… and with your consistency & dedication to the programs our trainer's create for you, AMAZING results! Our trainers also create programs for you to do on your own if you are going on vacation as well as your off training days. Accountability and momentum are key! *We always offer the first 30 minute assessment session on the house to make sure we are a good fit!    Pricing  Tier 1 single personal training session at our facility: $125.00,  10 sessions $1150.00 ($115 per - save $150)  20 sessions $2000.00 $100 per - most popular $500 savings)  50 sessions $$4750.00 ($95 per-$1500 savings)  100 sessions $9000.00. ($90 per-$3500 savings- our 2nd most popular package)   Tier 1 Home Visit Private Single: $150  10: $1400.00 ($140 per)  20: $2600.00 ($130 per)  50: $6000.00 ($120 per)  100: $10,000.00 $100 per)   24 hour cancellation policy. No fee but you lose the session. Please contact Jeni Fujita as soon as you know you have to cancel, by texting 917 405 4052.

name: ONLINE: Alignment Flow
description: This class welcomes all yogis looking to refine and strengthen their physical alignment in their practice. This class will include longer holding of poses, the use of props and alignment based sequences to aid in strengthening and opening the body as well as creating ease, stability, and freedom in areas of tension. Get ready to… challenge your body and mind, yet rediscover the fundamentals of each asana.

name: Livestream: Bar Method Express
description: Low impact. High reward. Our classic interval-training workout is designed to help you lose inches by burning fat and sculpting lean muscles. A well-designed sequence of specific movements will target and reshape your muscles. And stretches incorporated throughout the class will tone and elongate your body. The best method to… transform and renew you.45 minutes  Who it's for:Everyone  especially those seeking optimal fat-burning workouts and full-body transformation.  What you can gain:Stronger, leaner musclesIncreased flexibilityImproved posture, core strength and balance

name: Hour L2 LIVESTREAM
address: 135 West 20th Street 6th Floor b/w 6th & 7th Ave, New York, NY 10011Midtown
description: This is a one hour version of our Level 2 class  a well-rounded practice in a shorter amount of time. You have an understanding of the basic poses and transitional movements of a Vinyasa class (down dog, plank, chaturanga, cobra/upward dog). Youll get more dynamic sequences with challenging poses, subtle… alignment of basic poses, and an introduction to other yoga practices.  THIS IS AN ONLINE CLASS! Sign up here, and you'll receive an email to the address associated with your Yogamaya account with a link to take your class from afar.  First time joining us online?  If you are using a computer/laptop, please visit www.zoom.us to sign up. If you are joining us on your mobile device (phone, iPad, tablet, etc.), please download the Zoom app.  Please take a few moments to get to know the Zoom software, as it may be difficult for us to troubleshoot once you are in the class. If you have questions, please e-mail info@yogamayanewyork.com.

name: Vinyasa Flow - ONLINE
description: Turn your attention inward as you link your movement to your breath. Work up a sweat as you move through a dynamic series of postures. Open/Intermediate level.

name: OPEN POWER NAP
address: 85 Broad Street Lower Level, New York, NY 10004Lower Manhattan
description: A short nap in the mid-afternoon can boost memory, improve job performance, lift your mood, make you more alert, and ease stress. Exercise your right to Nap with Private and Open Studio Power Nap Sessions now available at Rise By We. Bring your need for some late afternoon rejuvenation and well take care of… the rest.

name: Acting Through Song  | Zonya Love
description: Singing is, well, a talent. Telling a story through song is a skill.  Allow me to help you dig deeper into the lyrics of a song. I will guide you through acting techniques that will allow you to connect with and personalize the material thereby enhancing your performance. Well utilize subtext, strategy, and substitution to craft a song that… isnt only beautiful to hear, but also compelling to watch.  IMPORTANT INFORMATION:Four Singers will perform. This class will be useful for all participants, not just the featured Singers.For those who would like to sing:1. Sign up!2. Email evie@broadwayweekends.com with the date & class you would like to sing in.3. 48 hours before class, those who have been randomly selected to sing will be contacted. They will have 24 hours to claim their space before it is passed on!  For those who want to audit:1. Sign up!2. Turn up!

name: Virtual BillPower Vinyasa  Flow (online)
address: 68 Summit Street Suite 2C, Brooklyn, NY 11231Columbia Street Waterfront District
description: This virtual class is LIVE STREAMED via Zoom. Upon booking, you'll receive an email notification invite to join the class. This class, taught by Llamaste founder Bill Ades, is a vigorous vinyasa flow, designed for anyone who is looking to renew their energy and rhythm, as well as de-stress from a busy afternoon. Ignite the breath… and warm the body, followed by powerful postures, ending with a cool and relaxing savanna. You will feel both relaxed, invigorated, and revitalized - have a towel with you as you will work up a nice sweat and shed off a few pounds you may have gained from being stuck inside the home. Pose variations included for all levels.

name: Little Heroes
description: Little Heroes (Ages 3 - 5) is an 8-stage certification program designed to enhance our students' developing mental and physical skills with a fun and motivational approach. Our curriculum consists of developing eight major skill requirements that are represented by eight different colors. These skills are essential for… participation in all areas of life, including school, home, sports, and other social settings:  FOCUS - This skill will help your child's concentration, listening, and reaction skills.TEAMWORK - Your child will learn to work and play alongside his/her peers. The more confident your child is while working with others, the more your child will develop character, better social skills, and leadership abilities.  CONTROL - Your child will learn about making the right decisions and know when to use/not to use their Taekwon-do skills.  BALANCE - He or she will develop good balance and better posture, which can improve other physical activities and reduce injuries.  MEMORY - We'll exercise your child's brain with mental activities to improve their thinking and memory for schoolwork.  DISCIPLINE - Your child will learn to take direction from teachers and elders, as well as take pride in doing the right thing at the right time.  FITNESS - Your child will learn about the importance of being healthy.  COORDINATION - We will help develop your child's coordination skills to improve reactions and decrease risks of injuries from physical activity.  With a different skill highlighted every week, you and your child can look forward to the following:  Improvement of motor skillsImprovement of listening skillsBetter study habitsConfidenceLeadershipResponsibilityPositive social interaction and working with othersAttention spanMotivation  Upon completion of the Little Heroes program, our students will receive an official certificate issued by Martial Arts Education Society. The Little Heroes program will also prepare our students for the Martial Mind Program and start their path towards their black belt in traditional Taekwon-do.

name: Martial Mind
description: Martial Mind (Ages 5 - 7) is an 18-24 month, traditional martial arts-based Social and Emotional Learning (SEL) certification program, inspired by Headmaster Kwok's program designed for formal education. We, as educators, aim to nurture the character development of our students so they can grow into respectful,… well-coping, and moral individuals. As children at this age are still in the early stages of developing cognitive skills, the belt system is divided into different checkpoints for the preparation of their entry to the Juniors program.Besides learning to kick and punch properly, as well as age-appropriate self-defense techniques, we will spotlight a key theme, such as respect, focus, integrity, and self-control. We will demonstrate the meaning behind the selected theme and how it benefits the students' social skills and emotional competencies through physical practice. We aim to guide students to transfer the skills learned in class to their lives in academic and home settings.  Upon completion of the Martial Mind program, our students will receive an official certificate issued by Martial Arts Education Society. They are expected to progress in our Juniors Taekwon-do program at an accelerated rate.

name: AUDRAROX  Music Class (Age 0-4) https://zoom.us/meeting/register/v5YudOyprT0ioQFHQDj8pJr3U2LZHZRt3A
description: Music for Aardvarks classes w/AudraRox Inc.birth to 4 year olds  Register for class via the below link: https://zoom.us/meeting/register/v5YudOyprT0ioQFHQDj8pJr3U2LZHZRt3A    Come share in the fun at Music for Aardvarks classes!  Its a musical experience for families with children from newborn to four years old.  Well explore music… through song and gesture, dance and movement, rhythm training and instrument play.  AudraRox Inc. classes are limited to a small number of participants to provide a focused, intimate environment where children can enjoy their first circle-time, as they practice structure, sharing, and early social skills. By coming together weekly, we create a community vibe that provides children with the security to explore and learn, and for their caregivers to bond and form friendships as well.   Adults are an important part of the dynamic and encouraged to participate as role models for their children.  Original songs like Taxi, City Kid, and Subway (all written by David Weinstone) celebrate the lives of children growing up in the city and provide a positive image to help your kids relate to and celebrate the world around them.  Join us as we discover and sing together!

name: Original Hot Yoga 75 Live Stream
description: Original Hot Yoga is a series of twenty-six Hatha Yoga postures and two Pranayama breathing techniques designed to provide a challenging, invigorating, rejuvenating and effective yoga experience. During this 75 minute class, you will work every muscle, tendon, ligament, joint and internal organ in the entire… body, giving you an incredible sense of well being.  This class is delivered by Zoom in partnership with FitGrid LIVE. You can enroll for this class up until two minutes before the scheduled start. You will receive an email from FitGrid LIVE starting an hour before the class with instructions.

name: Jam Sessions Music - Zoom Interactive Class
address: 123 W20th Street 2E Second floor, New York, NY 10011Midtown
description: IF THERE IS NO SIGN UP OR BOOK CLASS BUTTON THE CLASS IS FULL.  Jam Sessions via ZOOM are interactive! Unlike livestreaming, in these sessions your child's favorite teacher can see and interact with your child. Register for this class and receive a link and a password via email to log in and join the fun! Jam Sessions via ZOOM… will be limited to 8 participants. Join Kids at Work Teachers for 35 minutes of music from the comfort of your own home. Further instructions will be sent for participants that register at least 15 minutes before class! These sessions are $15 per class.  Before Class: Download zoom (https://zoom.us/download) well before class time. Please be aware that when joining this class there is the potential for participants to see one another. All audio will be muted except for teacher for MOST of the class. If you do not want to be seen simply disable your video.  Do I need anything for this class?Please gather any instruments you might have for our "Jam Session". Other objects such as pots and pans, wooden spoons, or Tupperware filled with beans or rice (reinforce with some tape) will work too! If you have bubbles or scarves/pieces of fabric please make them available as we may use those as well!  Didn't get the email with all the info to join the meeting? Check your spam! We'll usually send it about an hour before.

name: AQUA RESTORE - Women Only
address: 78 Franklin Street, New York, NY 10013Lower Manhattan
description: This class is WOMEN ONLY.  BREATH. ALIGN. STRETCH.Restore your physical and mental well-being, release stress, realign your body, connect to your mind. Combines mild aerobic exercise with deep breathing and stretching. - Recommended for: Rehab. Recovery. Sleep Therapy. Relaxation. Lymphatic Drainage.

name: Core Blast - 45 min (on ZOOM)
address: 250 Front Street Ground Floor, New York, NY 10038
description: Core Yoga is a core conditioning class drawing from Yoga, Pilates, gymnastics/acrobatic conditioning as well as other fitness/movement styles. Class will offer full body mobility and strength work with an emphasis on proper breathing mechanics and core activation.

name: VIRTUAL: Myofascial Release & Pilates
description: Myofascial Release & Pilates: We all need to unwind and destress, right? Well, Debbie has developed the perfect class for the end of a long day of working! (And even if you plan to work more, this class is a wonderful, restorative break to rejuvenate you before you hit the desk again!) Debbie leads an invigorating… Pilates mat class that infuses myofascial release with massage balls or tennis balls on key trigger points. Youll feel like you got a personal training session and a massage all in one!

name: Dharma I | Beginner | Online Class
address: 46 West 24th Street Lobby, New York , NY 10010
description: Dharma I - Beginner This is the beginning level of the Dharma Yoga series. Students practice Surya Namaskar Vinyasa and Shiva Namaskar Vinyasa Level I to warm up the body, bring flexibility to all muscles and joints and wake up the nervous system. A gentle, yet powerful series of balancing, stretching, back bending, twisting… and mild inverted postures follow. This practice ends with Deep Relaxation, breathing exercises and concentration/meditation to remove impurities and bring a sense of well-being to the body and radiant peace to the mind.    Please check out our DYC Zoom Online Classes & Prices: * Unlimited students If you are unable to attend any practice you registered in, when possible please remove yourself. description: Note: This class happens in 117 14th Street, B, Brooklyn, 11215. This is an aerial hoop conditioning class. Warm up will be based on core strengthening. Then students will learn basic grips, various technique hangs, swing like movements and given time to practice and record themselves with their own phones.  *Students… must wear appropriate apparel during class including leggings and t-shirt to wear during class time.*  *No jewelry allowed to be worn during class due to safety liability reasons including it will tear your skin open, damage your jewelry, and possibly lose it in the studio.*  Upon entry be prepared to take your shoes off; we con-exist with a martial arts academy.  Note:This class happens in 117 14th Street, B, Brooklyn, 11215.

description: Ours are different from regular boxing classes you might find elsewhere in that you work with a group of trainers each time that you come in. All of our trainers are active or former professional athletes who are well-versed in what it takes to get you to achieve your goals in a challenging, exciting, yet safe way. name: LIVESTREAM YOGASPARK: Soundtrack Favorites
description: Make your flow feel like a film! Should you choose to be seen, that will help them give you verbal adjustments and shout outs as well as create more of a class vibe, but it is entirely up to you! You will be muted once c

name: Livestream Dharma Yoga 60 min
address: 121 Fulton Street 3rd Floor, New York, NY 10038
description: A gentle, yet powerful series of balancing, stretching, back bending, twisting and mild inverted postures follow. The physical posture practice (Asana) tones and invigorates the body and mind, leading to enhanced flexibility, strength, balance and concentration. Breathing exercises (pranayama) and meditative techniques… regulate the heartbeat, de-stress the nervous system and calm the mind. This practice ends with Deep Relaxation, breathing exercises and concentration/meditation to remove impurities and bring a sense of well-being to the body and radiant peace to the mind. Turn on your video for corrections from the teacher.

name: Livestream Urban Warriors - Yoga
address: 100 Hudson Street  4th Fl. (entrance on 1st) , Hoboken, NJ 07030
description: At once vigorous and cathartic, youll groove to an experiential landscape of flow and breath set to DJ-quality playlists. Well begin with balancing breathwork to calm your nerves and reboot energy. Soon after, youll find yourself flowing through seamless sequences as your mind synchronizes effortlessly with the rhythm… of your breath, the rhythm of movement, and the rhythm of music. When its time to wind down from this uplifting flow, well melt into deep stretches and, of course, a sweet final relaxation so that every beautiful benefit sinks inmind, body and soul. Ahhhhh.... OPEN LEVEL/STRONG FLOW.

name: Virtual Mat Pilates
description: Come work out with Elevate from the comfort of your own home! This signature class will incorporate some of the same moves you love to do on the reformer (but on the mat) and more! Work your body in different ways strengthening and lengthening every inch! Abs, butt,arms and more finishing with a calming stretch!

name: VIRTUAL: FULL BODY
description: A 45 minute at home Mat class using the Zoom app. You will need to download the app, and provide an active email address to be able to access class. This will be 45 minutes of intense full body Mat Pilates, and may incorporate some at home "props" for extra work.  Look for your invite email from… bumpilatesinfo@gmail.com. You will receive an email 30 minutes before the class. The "meeting" will be open 5 minutes before class starts. Once class has started, please turn OFF your audio. If you wish to turn off your video as well, you are more than welcome to do so. *Check the expiration date on your class purchases. No refunds or reschedules.*

name: Empower Yoga
description: An athletic, vinyasa-based class to strengthen your body as well as your mental focus. Classes integrate sun salutations, standing postures, arm balances, core work and backbends in 60-minutes or less.

name: MarcoYoga Vinyasa
address: 25 West 31st Street Floor 6, New York, NY 10001
description: This class is an inward journey of Raja Yoga, the Royal Yoga, and consists of intelligent sequencing with attention to precision and alignment. All levels welcome.Mats and props provided.

name: Pole Dance for Beginners (Wellness Program)
address: 43 Schermerhorn Street 117 14th Street, Brooklyn, NY 11201Brooklyn Heights
description: Welcome to Pole Dance Basics (Wellness Program.)Start here if you have little to no experience or getting back into pole. This pole dance basic foundation class emphasizes 3 basic pole fitness concepts to ensure safe and strong pole journey ahead:  1. How to work the core central muscle groups necessary for pole… fitness through simple exercises. Ex: baseball grips, knee tuck ups, jasmine grip, and fan kicks.  2. Develop the proprioception of your body limbs necessary for pole fitness tricks. Ex: Pirouette turn to climb to invert.  3. Through repetition and drilling the foundational pole movements students will develop the muscle memory and coordination necessary.  Throughout the class, students will learn basic terminology to name movements.  *Shorts are required so your skin will grip the pole*  *Absolutely NO jewelry for liability safety reasons including it will tear your skin, dent your jewelry, and possibly get lost in the studio*  Upon entry be prepared to take your shoes off. No street shoes or heels allowed to be worn during class and inside the studio.

name: Open Level Vinyasa (Livestream)
address: 61 4th Avenue 3rd Floor, New York, NY 10003Lower Manhattan
description: Come as You Are. A open-level and well-rounded practice thats appropriate for those with experience in group classes.

name: All Levels Online Live Stream
address: 56 East 11th Street, New York, NY 10003Lower Manhattan
description: This is a well-rounded class that welcomes a wide range of students and levels, encouraging students to individualize their practice by establishing their own degree of intensity. Sequences are kept simple enough so that beginners can learn the basics while instruction is detailed and subtle enough to lead… experienced practitioners to explore deeper levels of their practice through asana, pranayama, and meditation. This class is perfect for the adventurous beginner as well as the experienced practitioner.

name: Vinyasa | All Levels | Online, live via zoom
description: This is an online class that takes place live via Zoom. Sign up in advance of the class and receive an email invitation before the class begins. You'll need zoom account to join.  Vinyasa | All LevelsVinyasa is a moving meditation where each pose is strung together on the the thread of breath. At the Shala, vinyasa is shaped by the lineage… of Ashtanga Yoga: economic, rigorous, and challenging. All Level classes are a well-rounded blend of alignment and fluid movement. Open to beginning practitioners with some knowledge of foundational postures (Surya Namaskar, standing and seated poses, backbends), as well as intermediate and advanced practitioners interested moving in a gentler and more precise way. Guidance will be provided regarding safe alignment, strength-building, joint stabilization, and proper breathing technique.

name: Ethno-Energetic Healing Circle  Community of Wisdom and Practice with Bob Vetter
description: There will be Ceremony, a teaching, sharing and a takeaway.  Sliding scale weekly offering with Bob Vetter.  $25 - $50  Robert Vetter, M.A. is a cultural anthropologist whose life work concerns the intersection of spirituality and healing in diverse indigenous cultures. His original fieldwork focused on Native North American… medicine, especially that of the Southern Plains. Along with his adopted uncle, medicine man Richard Tartsah Sr., he authored the book Big Bow: The Spiritual Life and Teachings of a Kiowa Family. Following his studies in the traditional Mesoamerican healing system called Curanderismo with teachers both in the United States and in Mexico, he maintains a healing practice as well as a community temazcal (Mesoamerican sweat lodge) in Long Island, New York. Robert is a featured curandero in the book Curandero: Traditional Healers of Mexico and the Southwest by Eliseo Torres and Imanol Miranda. He is an instructor at University of New Mexicos annual conference on Curanderismo, as well as Courseras online course entitled Curanderismo: Traditional Medicine of Mexico and the Southwest.

name: FLOW > ROOFTOP
address: 406 Broadway LVL 3, New York, NY 10013Lower Manhattan
description: Join us on the Tribeca rooftop for a socially distanced outdoor music led FLOW.  Outdoor classes are held on individual yoga platforms that are all well over 6+ feet away from each other, so your space will be clearly delineated. Classes are held weather permitting. During the evening timeslots we don't get direct sun,… so layer if you'd like! Day sessions sunblock is a must!*The studio itself will not be open, so please use the bathroom before you come.*Please bring your own mat, towel and water. If you don't have a mat (I'm pretty sure you all do though), let us know and we'll have one for you.*Please wear a face-covering upon entering the building. You'll head all the way up the stairs until you get to the roof (you'll hear us...just follow the music). Pick your platform and set your things on it or to the side.*Roof space opens 15 minutes before class starts. Please do not arrive excessively early to avoid congregating and practice social distancing both inside and outside of the building.  Once we start to practice, you can take your face covering off, though of course are welcome to leave it on if you prefer. It will be at the discretion of the instructor if they wish to wear face coverings as they will also be socially distanced and will not move throughout the class without one. No physical contact or hands-on adjustments will be performed.  When we're done with class, please throw your face covering back on as you move from your platform and exit the building. I'm sure we're all going to want to chat, but let's keep it extra safe for now. Face masks and distancing are key!  PLEASE BE VIGILANT, IF YOU DON'T FEEL WELL PLEASE STAY HOME :-) ALL CLASSES CANCELLED DUE TO ILLNESS/PRECAUTION WILL BE CREDITED TO ANOTHER TIMESLOT.

name: Hour L2 LIVESTREAM
address: 135 West 20th Street 6th Floor b/w 6th & 7th Ave, New York, NY 10011Midtown
description: This is a one hour version of our Level 2 class  a well-rounded practice in a shorter amount of time. You have an understanding of the basic poses and transitional movements of a Vinyasa class (down dog, plank, chaturanga, cobra/upward dog). If you have questions, please e-mail info@yogamayanewyork.com.

name: Pilates
address: 126 5th Avenue corner of 18th street, New York, NY 10011
description: Class Description: Pilates is for and can help every BODY. This functional Pilates mat class combines elements of traditional Pilates, modern exercise principles, yoga, and stretching to help participants combat the stiffness and stress that often comes with our daily activities. Focus is on bringing awareness to the importance of… breath and learning how to activate core strength and postural muscles. Through a variety of different movements, you will find greater range of motion and an improvement of strength, flexibility and balance, which can help with rehabilitation, athletic performance, prenatal maintenance, postpartum recovery, as well as simply getting out of the "hunched over the computer" position. This class will leave you feeling longer, leaner, stronger and ready to take on the day!  Level: Open Level  Recommended Attire: Your favorite Athleta gear - We suggest our Powervita fabric that is buttery soft with compression + Made in a Fair Trade Certified Factory. Barefoot or barre socks optional

name: AERIAL SILK - LEVEL 1
description: Develop your strength, stamina and stability in Level 1 Silk. You should be able to perform a basic climb and create foot locks on both sides unassisted in the air. Class will begin with basic skills and conditioning, gradually progressing into learning more elaborate poses and tricks as well as longer sequences of aerial movement.

name: Virtual 30 Min. Cardio Fun
address: 69 Columbia Street 3rd Floor, Brooklyn, NY 11201Columbia Street Waterfront District
description: Little known fact, Cadence began her fitness teaching at 18 years old teaching cardio kickboxing at an independent gym in Massachusetts... She will draw on that ancient skill and her current knowledge to lead a fun, easy to follow cardio class. We'll get our blood flowing, abate our anxiety and do some old school… cardio good for our cooped up bodies.  Needed: Bare feet or sneakers and a floor you won't slip on.  A Zoom link will be emailed to you from Dibs 10 minutes before class starts.  If your roommate or partner joins, we strongly suggest that they sign up as well so the instructor will be paid fairly and can teach effectively.

name: Yoga for Climbers
description: This is the perfect cross-training complement for those whose eyes are set on the vertical prize. Together well flow from pose to pose while enhancing mobility, lower body strength, balance, and core. Challenge yourselfmentally and physicallyas you breathe through a balanced practice of deep stretching and… strengthening. Well provide the matsjust come with with an open mind. (All levels welcome)  For questions on programming or for booking support please email queensbridge.cnf@brooklynboulders.com

name: Intermediate Level Reformer
description: Intermediate Level Reformer classes are ideal for clients who have consistently practiced and have a good understanding of the principles of Pilates as well as how to navigate the equipment. 55 minutes

name: Online Class on Zoom - Vinyasa
description: This class will be held online via Zoom.$10 drop in, free for all members with unlimited passes.You'll need a an account with Zoom (free), you might want to download the Zoom App. Register per usual via Mindbody or our free Namastuy App up to 30min before class & you'll get an email with a link and password to join in… 10min before class begin.    Dynamic. A fluid, guided breath to breath practice arranged to utilize postures to increase focus, as well as body awareness. Heavy alignment cues are used to guide students to a deeper level of intelligence that grants the freedom to heal and transform. Classes offer an opportunity for Pranayama, as well as meditation. This class is beneficial to every student, as it increases focus and relief from daily stressors. Accessible to all levels.

name: VIRTUAL Clash Cardio
description: A perfect open level class for Afro & Soca Lovers looking for a good sweat! Beginners get familiar with basic sequencing through a simplified version of ILLYs Dance CLASH routines and avid movers/dancers are welcomed to build stamina and endurance. Class starts with a warm up which builds into the Dance CLASH routine… for the day. We follow up with a body weight burn out and close with a light stretch! Class is conducted with predominately Soca music but Afro music is occasionally thrown in the mix as well. Dance movement is inspired by Caribbean Soca, Traditional west African and Afro street styles.

name: Livestream Evening Chill - Yoga
address: 100 Hudson Street  4th Fl. (entrance on 1st) , Hoboken, NJ 07030
description: Youve been movin and groovin all day... This is your time to chill! Come back to your breath, slow down the frenetic pace of urban living, tune into what your mind-body needs mostthen relax deeply with a sweet, restorative finish. To start, after some centering and warming, gentle movement, well flow breath by breath to a… beautifully chill soundtrack, while reigniting our personal and collective energy. After our vinyasa flow journey, well begin to take the energy back down, easing into postures that reconnect and relax US with grounding stretches that prepare the body and mind for letting go completely. Youll melt in passive restorative postures, supported by blankets, blocks and bolsters, to create a sense of space and openingand deep relaxation, effortlessly. Then youll float home, unencumbered by the events of the day. Sounds amazing, right?! OPEN LEVEL.

name: Row HIIT (Virtual Class) *ROWER REQUIRED
description: 30 Minute Virtual Class Using the Concept2 Rower at home follow us through 6 rounds of interval training . We use body weight exercises as well as some equipment like dumbbells and resistance bands.

name: Virtual Pilates for All Over the World!
address: 69 Columbia Street 3rd Floor, Brooklyn, NY 11201Columbia Street Waterfront District
description: Based on Brooklyn Strength's open level Pilates for All class, but virtual! Bring your mat to your screen, grab a few canned goods to use as weights and a block or similar object. We'll anchor ourselves in our bodies and finish off our at-home workday with some larger movement and mobility re-centering ourselves… the Pilates way.  You will be emailed a Zoom link 10 minutes before the class begins from Dibs.  If your roommate or partner joins, we strongly suggest that they sign up as well so the instructor will be paid fairly and can teach effectively.

name: Sattva Sunset Flow in the Park
description: Join us as we gather once more for Open Level Flow classes safely distanced outdoors!  You will find us at this lovely spot at Riverview on the Ogden Ave. and Griffith Street. Classes are by REGISTRATION ONLY, open to Monthly members and available with Sattva class packages, singles can be purchased as well.… NO DROP INS, no sales transactions on site. We must limit class size for distancing purposes.  Please bring a mat and be prepared to distance 6 feet apart. All participants must wear a mask upon arrival to check in with the teacher, masks can be removed when the practice begins..    WEATHER PERMITTING, you will be contacted no less than 1 hour before class if cancelled.

name: Virtual Pilates Mat
description: Pilates is a form of exercise that focuses on strengthening the core using certain principles of breathing, control, precision and coordination. The movements are performed slowly and gracefully in order to help form longer leaner muscles and to stretch as well as strengthen. No equipment is necessary for this… class. It can be done on a mat or beach towel.

name: MarcoYoga Slow Flow
address: 25 West 31st Street Floor 6, New York, NY 10001
description: This class is an inward journey of Raja Yoga, the Royal Yoga, and consists of intelligent sequencing with attention to precision and alignment. All levels welcome.  Mats and props provided.
